temp_clean.name: Temporary File Cleanup
temp_clean.description: Cleans various temporary file locations and prefetch.

sys_scan.name: System File Scan & Repair
sys_scan.description: Runs SFC (System File Checker) and DISM to repair system image.

disk_repair.name: Disk Check (C:)
disk_repair.description: Schedules CHKDSK for drive C: on the next restart.

net_reset.name: Network Stack Reset
net_reset.description: Resets Winsock, IP stack, and flushes DNS cache.
